construct_data.instruction.alternate_case_correct_answer.apply_instruction(input_candidate: str)[source]

transforms the given string into alternate case. The first character will always be in uppercase, followed by lowercase, and then uppercase and so on

Parameters:

input_candidate (str) – input string

Returns:

string in alternate case

Return type:

construct_data.instruction.increment_correct_numeric_answer_by_one module

construct_data.instruction.increment_correct_numeric_answer_by_one.apply_instruction(input_candidate: str)[source]

The function checks if the provided text contains a numeric value. If the text is a numeric value then increments the numeric value by one and returns the updated text.

Parameters:

construct_data.instruction.increment_incorrect_numeric_answers_by_one module

construct_data.instruction.increment_incorrect_numeric_answers_by_one.apply_instruction(input_candidate: str, candidate_answer_set: list)[source]

Input candidate here is the “ground truth” that we want to avoid printing out. And then perform increment on all the other options in the candidate answer set

construct_data.instruction.sort_options_to_create_string module

construct_data.instruction.sort_options_to_create_string.apply_instruction(candidate_answer_set: list)[source]

This function takes in a list as input, sorts the list in alphabetical order. The last alphanumeric character from each list item is extracted and concatenated to form a string

Parameters:

candidate_answer_set (list) – list of items

Returns:

string formed last characters from each list item post sorting

Return type:

_type_

construct_data.instruction.use_incorrect_options_to_create_string module

construct_data.instruction.use_incorrect_options_to_create_string.apply_instruction(input_candidate: str, candidate_answer_set: list)[source]

This function takes in a list and a list item as input. The given item is removed from the list and sorts the list in alphabetical order. The last alphanumeric character from each list item is extracted and concatenated to form a string

Parameters:

Returns:

string formed last characters from each list item post sorting
